templateData.kat:
The Tarantula Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Epic}} all the way up to {{Mythic}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|5,000,000}}
512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_string.gif|25px|link=Tarantula Web]] [[Tarantula Web]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|3,500,000}}
512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_string.gif|25px|link=Tarantula Web]] [[Tarantula Web]] |time_epic = 10 Days |cost_legendary_level_1 = {{Coins|1,000,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_fake_neuroscience_degree.png|25px|link=Fake Neuroscience Degree]] [[Fake Neuroscience Degree]] |cost_legendary_level_100 = {{Coins|700,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_fake_neuroscience_degree.png|25px|link=Fake Neuroscience Degree]] [[Fake Neuroscience Degree]] |time_legendary = 1 Hour |rarity_low = {{Epic}} |rarity_high = {{Mythic}} |cost_total_level_1 = {{Coins|6,000,000}}
512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_string.gif|25px|link=Tarantula Web]] [[Tarantula Web]]
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_fake_neuroscience_degree.png|25px|link=Fake Neuroscience Degree]] [[Fake Neuroscience Degree]] |cost_total_level_100 = {{Coins|4,200,000}}
512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_string.gif|25px|link=Tarantula Web]] [[Tarantula Web]]
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_fake_neuroscience_degree.png|25px|link=Fake Neuroscience Degree]] [[Fake Neuroscience Degree]] |time_total = 10 Days, 1 Hour }}
